message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $14,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know if you're open to that.
Bob, I understand your aim for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
